content: wide brimmed hat keito s clothes july 7 2023 this is a wide-brimmed hat with a slightly wavy brim that gives a vivacious impression this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size ◆height 37cm to the toes ◆bust 18cm ◆waist 13cm ◆hips 18cm ◆foot 3 5cm this hat size may not be able to be worn depending on the doll s hair volume this pattern is available on my blog check out here blog post keito s wide brimmed hat about me hello i am nio this pattern is posted on my blog with additional instructions so please check it out english is not my native tongue but i ll do my best to answer your questions i hope you enjoy my pattern my blog knit doll keito 1 / 3 ©2023 nioknits wide brimmed hat keito s clothes july 7 2023 materials yarn sport weight yarn used in this pattern eco-andaria-crochet/hamanaka 100% rayon 125 meters / 30 grams amount of yarn i actually used 33 3 m / 8 g pattern gauge single_crochet stitch 13 stitches / per 5 cm with 2 3 mm crochet hook crochet hook ◆2 3 mm larger ◆2 mm smaller use to clarify the shape of the crown others ◆yarn needle ◆scissors abbreviations and stitch symbols chain - chain slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet revsc - reverse single_crochet inc2sc - increase single_crochet in the same place pattern notes ◆this hat begins to be made from the crown of the head the process is to make the crown while increasing stitches then add more stitches to make the brim ◆use a smaller hook in round 13 to clarify the shape of the crown ◆when the hat is finished gently stretch the brim edge to make the brim wave pattern crown cast on round1 using larger hook 2 3 mm begins with the circular cast on method wrap the thread around your finger twice to make two loops and then wrap it around the loops to make one chain stitch continue 1sc 6 times pull the thread ends to shrink the cast-on loop work a slip stitch at the top of the first single_crochet round2 1ch inc2sc 6 times work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet =12sc round3 1ch 1sc inc2sc 6 times work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet =18sc round4 1ch 1sc inc2sc 1sc 1sc 5 times inc2sc 1sc work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet =24sc round5 1ch 1sc 1sc 1sc inc2sc 6 times work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet =30sc round6 1ch 1sc 1sc inc2sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 5 times inc2sc 1sc 1sc work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet =36sc the diameter reaches 4 cm at this round round7 1ch work 36sc into each place work a slip_stitch at the top of the first single_crochet continue this round until round 12 or until you reach 4
